ん……？ ねえ、何か見えてきたよ？: Hm...? Hey, I think I see something.
……あれは、無人兵站拠点ですわね。\nようやく、到着したのですね……:
...That's an unmanned logistics base.
We've finally arrived...
さっきの壊れたＭＧからちゆるが回収したマップは、\nここまでの道をしっかり正確に:
Chiyuru recovered the map from the broken MG earlier
I had been able to record the path up to this point with perfect accuracy.
急いで補給を行った方が……いいかもね。\n七彩ちゃんも……あたしも、かなりキテる:
We should hurry up and resupply.
Nanaya-chan... I'm pretty hard too...
……レーダーにも特に反応はないな。\nよし、拠点の中に入り次第、補給を済ませよう:
There's no sign of anything on the radar, either.
All right, let's resupply as soon as we get inside the base.
物資の補給は私が行いますね。%usernameusernameuserna%さん:
I'll resupply. %usernameusernameuserna%
Please let Nanaya-san and the others rest!
迷惑をおかけして申し訳ありませんわ……: I'm sorry for causing you so much trouble...
……大深度地下探索のための物資に手を付けるのは忍びないが、\n背に腹は代えられな:
...I couldn't bear to touch the supplies for exploring the Great Depths, but...
I can't change my mind.
（あとで生徒会に報告する時に、\n詫びでも入れておけばいいだろう）:
(When reporting to the student council later,
I should probably add an apology.)
雑用はこちらでやっておく。\n七彩、ちゆる。一旦休んでおけ。:
I'll handle the chores here.
Shichisai, Chiyuru. Get some rest.
ありがとう、%usernameusernameuserna%。\nお言葉に甘えさ:
Thank you, %usernameusernameuserna%.
I'll take you up on your offer.
わたくしも、少し休ませてもらいますわ……: I'll be taking a short rest, too...
ここは天井が低くて壁が湾曲した狭小な空間だから、\n大型のメイズシフターとかは入:
This was a small space with low ceilings and curved walls, so...
It doesn't look like any big maise shifters will be able to get in.
確かにここならある程度は安全そうね。: It does seem safe here to some extent.
（とはいえ、ふたりが多少の休憩で回復できるほど、\n軽度のようにも思えないな）:
(That said, it was enough for the two of them to recover after a short break
It doesn't even seem mild.)
（現状メイズシンドロームの症状は全員精神面より肉体面に出てる。\n中でも七彩とち:
(As things stand, all of the symptoms of the mace syndrome are more physical than mental.
The symptoms of shichisai and chiyuru are especially bad...)
一刻も早く地上に出してやらないとな……: We need to get him to the surface as soon as possible...
物資の補給が終わりました！\n七彩さんとちゆるさん、大丈夫ですか……？:
We've finished resupplying!
Nanaya-san and Chiyuru-san, are you okay...?
ギリギリって感じ。ひとまず休ませておこ。: It feels like it's just barely enough. Let me rest for now.
お前も今のうちに休んでおけ、める。\n食欲がなくても胃袋にものを入れておいた方が:
You should rest while you still can.
Even if you don't have an appetite, it's better to put it in your stomach too.
……めるも戻ってきた事だし、\n休息ついでに作戦会議といこう。:
...Megumo's back,
Let's have a strategy meeting while we're resting.
これから地上を目指すまでの間、\n俺は七彩と機体を入れ替わろうと思う。:
From now until we reach the surface,
I think I'll switch gears with Shichisai.
ああ。代わりに七彩を霞光に乗せる。\n今の七彩に戦闘はきついだろうからな。:
Yeah. Instead, I put the seven colors on the hazy light.
Battles would be tough for Shichika right now, after all.
まさか%usernameusernameuserna%が前で戦うつもり？: Don't tell me %usernameusernamesuserna% are going to fight in front of us?
そこまで自分を過信しちゃいない。俺は斥候を引き受けるつもりだ。: I don't overestimate myself that much. I intend to take on the scouts.
……%usernameusernameuserna%さ、自分の立場とか分かってる:
...%user name, username, user name, %. Do you know where you stand?
If %usernameusernamesuserna% goes bad, who will take command?
さすがにそこまで無茶をする気はない。: I had no intention of doing anything that reckless.
%usernameusernameuserna%が何を言おうとも却下よ、却下。: No matter what %usernameusernameUserna% says, it's rejected, rejected.
そもそも、今の七彩が霞光に乗ったとして、攻撃されたらどうするの。\n武装のない霞:
In the first place, even if the current Shichika rode the hazy light, what if he was attacked?
If a sick person gets on a hazy, unarmed light, they'll just be a burden.
じゃあいっそのこと霞光を置いていって、\n七彩と俺が同乗するとか……:
Then leave Kasumi Hikaru behind,
Like Shichika and I riding together...
霞光をここで失うのは、学園にとってもかなりの損失じゃないかと……: Losing Kasumi here would be a huge loss for the school...
霞光のレーダー索敵は、地上を目指すためにも必要。\n捨てるなんて論外。:
Kasumi Hikaru's radar search is necessary to get to the surface.
Throwing it away was out of the question.
そうは言うが、じゃあどうしろと？: You say that, but then what do you want me to do?
だーから、さっきと同じで、斥候はラミに任せときなって。\nおまえはいつも通り後ろ:
Like I said, just like before, leave the scouting to Rami.
You just need to take command from behind like you always do.
お前……さっきから思っていたが、変に責任を感じてるだろ。: You... I've been thinking this for a while now, but you feel strangely responsible.
チームが崩落に巻き込まれたのは、\n自分が未調査地域の探索を望んだせいだ、とか思:
The team was caught up in the collapse...
Maybe she thinks it's because she wanted to explore unexplored areas?
こうなったのは結果論だ。もし責任があるというのなら、\n最終的に探索を止められな:
It was the resultant argument that led to this. If you say you're responsible,
It's all because of everyone who couldn't stop searching in the end.
でも、それだけじゃないし。何としてでも、地上に戻りたいの。\nそのために必要なこ:
But that's not all. I want to return to the surface, no matter what.
I'm just doing what's necessary for that.
ラミの家はさ、昔はかなり貧乏だったんだよ。\nお金がないからまともな生活ができな:
Rami's family used to be pretty poor.
I couldn’t live a proper life because I didn’t have any money, and my family was on the verge of collapse.
お父さんとお母さんは毎日喧嘩しててさ、\nラミは弟や妹達に飛び火しないよう、外に:
Mom and dad fight every day,
Rami was taking her outside to keep her brothers and sisters from jumping into flames.
でも、ラミがパイロットになって……まあ、お金ができるから、\nあとはわかるでしょ:
But Rami became a pilot... Well, she could make money, so...
You know the rest, don't you? On the surface, it's back to peace.
もし家に金が入らなくなったら、弟達がどうなるか……\nあの子達のためにも、帰らな:
What would happen to my brothers if I didn't have enough money in my house...?
I have to go home for them.
……って、喋りすぎちゃった。\nメイズシンドロームのせいかな……もう二度としない:
...Wait, I'm talking too much.
Maybe it’s because of the Maze Syndrome... I’ll never do it again.
……確かにそれならラミが斥候を務めるのが一番効率的ね。: ...In that case, Rami would be the most efficient scout.
私も斥候はラミさんに任せていいと思います。\n%usernameusername:
I think Rami-san can handle scouts, too.
%usernameusernameuserna%-san can't be brought forward.
斥候、任せたぞ。: Scout, I'll leave it to you.
だが……これだけは忘れるなよ。\nラミ、お前はひとりじゃない。:
But...don't forget this.
Rami, you're not alone.
そう言ってラミは顔をそむける。: Rami turns her face away as she says that.
だが、一瞬見えたラミの横顔は\nどこか嬉しそうに見えた。:
But for a moment, I saw Rami’s profile
She looked somehow happy.
